AI News-Resources

October 4, 2019

ai   tech

Here are some newsletters, blogs, links, and twitter accounts that I follow to get the most up-to-date news and happenings in AI, to understand what AI is. (This list does not contain educational resources which are fairly straightforward to obtain - udemy, coursera, mit, etc…)

Newsletters

  • MIT Technology Review - The Algorithm
  • Data Elixir
  • Deep Learning Weekly
  • Inside AI
  • Import AI
  • The Batch
  • NLP News
  • ACM Tech News (not specifically AI)
  • Wild ML

Blogs

  • the morning paper
  • the Spectator
  • I’m a bandit
  • Francis Bach
  • Tombone’s Computer Vision Blog
  • machine learning mastery
  • Google Research Blog (ehem, of course -.-)
  • Open AI (i mean, come on)
  • Salesforce AI team
  • Towards Data Science
  • Karpathy(he does not really blog anymore, it is more of a deep learning bible)
  • Nielsen

  • Louis Kirsch

  • Twitter accounts

Awesome

  • Machine learning
  • Deep learning
  • Computer vision
  • Speech & Language Processing

Mailing lists

  • Deep Dyve subscription sends you the most recent journal titles of your interest.
  • Google Scholar Alerts informs you about the latest articles of the researchers/keywords/topics that you follow.
  • Robotics worldwide
  • ML news
